I20070110-1600

I had two instances of the History view open (one was not linked to editor and hidden in a view stack; the other was visible and linked to editor).

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-01-12 18:32:51.578
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Fetching local history revisions".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.history.EditionHistoryPage.update(EditionHistoryPage.java:203)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.history.LocalHistoryPage$RefreshFileHistory.run(LocalHistoryPage.java:199)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
To reproduce, set the History view to 'Link with Editor and Selection', and then select a field or an anonymous class in the Outline of a Java source editor.
